actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology

official_title: To provide for the award of a gold medal on behalf of Congress to Arnold Palmer in recognition of his service to the Nation in promoting excellence and good sportsmanship in golf.

summary.text: Directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President Pro Tempore of the Senate to arrange for the presentation of a congressional gold medal to Arnold Palmer (golf professional) in recognition of his service to the nation in promoting excellence and good sportsmanship.

titles.title: To provide for the award of a gold medal on behalf of Congress to Arnold Palmer in recognition of his service to the Nation in promoting excellence and good sportsmanship in golf.
